name: etch
description: Perform virtual DOM updates based on changes to a data model.

0.0.1.name: etch
0.0.1.description: Perform virtual DOM updates based on changes to a data model.

scripts.test: npm run standard && node_modules/.bin/electron-mocha --renderer --recursive ./test/helpers/register-babel  test
scripts.prepublish: npm run standard && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.standard: standard src test

keywords: virtual-dom dom view element custom-elements dom-diff atom electron
